thread.title: Field hockey | Early Bridgewater barrage sinks VWC
thread.title_full: Field hockey | Early Bridgewater barrage sinks VWC | HamptonRoads.com | PilotOnline.com

author: The Virginian-Pilot
title: Field hockey | Early Bridgewater barrage sinks VWC
text:
VIRGINIA BEACH Bridgewater scored four goals in the first 18:02 of the game en route to a 4-1 win over Virginia Wesleyan on Wednesday.
Missy Stroup scored at 12:18 of the game for the Marlins' lone goal.
Virginia Wesleyan (5-11, 1-3 ODAC) will host Eastern Mennonite for Senior Day at 1 p.m. Saturday. The dedication for Birdsong Field will take place at 11 a.m.
Follow @PilotSportsNow Posted to : Sports Virginia Beach
